author: bnicholes
msg: Added a check to make sure that h_aliases is not NULL before we try to
dereference it in the for(...) loop.  Attempting to dereference a NULL pointer
was causing a fault if there were no aliases found.

author: minfrin
msg: Apply a patch to compile cleanly again against changes to the shared memory

author: aaron
msg: Even though this is in APR, it is causing big problems in Apache.
